name: SUMOTEX
description: Sumotex AssetFi protocol tokenizes off-chain assets such as real estate, bonds, company shares and investment funds. Sumotex calls it (Tokenise-to-earn), where everybody will be able to tokenize their real estate/ real-world assets on the protocol where INSTANT liquidity is achieved. With tokenisation project lined up worth approximately 250mil USD. It has proven that traditional institutional finance and real estate is poised for web3 distruption, and SUMOTEX will be the one who will revolutionize the industry.
